special.name: Hand Size
special.text: You begin the game with 8 cards in your hand. This does not take an ability slot.

special.name: Life Total
special.text: You begin the game with 25 life. This does not take an ability slot.

special.name: Bonus Cards
special.text: You may open an additional booster pack from a set of your choice and add those cards to your draft pool. This does not take an ability slot.

special.name: Extra Ability
special.text: You may use an additional Adversary ability. This does not take an ability slot.

white.name: Soldiers
white.text: {3}{W},{T}: Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

white.name: Prevention
white.text: 4W, T: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to or by target creature this turn.

white.name: Overwhelm
white.text: Creatures can't be blocked unless all attacking creatures are blocked.

white.name: Favor
white.text: At the beginning of the game, name a creature. Creatures with the chosen name get +2/+2.

white.name: Lifelink
white.text: 1W, T: Target spell or creature gains lifelink until end of turn.

white.name: Protection
white.text: 3W, T: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

white.name: Sovereign
white.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 40 or more life, you win the game.

white.name: Captain
white.text: Creatures you control can block two additional creatures.

blue.name: Looting
blue.text: {U},{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

blue.name: Weaken
blue.text: {U}: Target creature gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

blue.name: Flight
blue.text: U, T: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

blue.name: Milling
blue.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

blue.name: Combat Foresight
blue.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may Scry 1.

blue.name: Librarian
blue.text: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

blue.name: Miracle
blue.text: 4U: The next nonland card you draw has Miracle X, where X is half its converted mana cost, rounded up.

blue.name: Flash
blue.text: Players may cast nonland cards as though they had flash.

blue.name: Oracle
blue.text: If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead.

black.name: Reanimate
black.text: {3}{B}, {T}: Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

black.name: Deathtouch
black.text: {2}{B}, {T}: Target spell or creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.

black.name: Morbidity
black.text: At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

black.name: Decay
black.text: {B}{B}: Target creature gets -0/-1 until end of turn.

black.name: Sacrifice
black.text: {4}{B}: Sacrifice a creature you control. Destroy target creature.

black.name: Revival
black.text: Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

black.name: Necrolord
black.text: If your graveyard is empty, your life total cannot change. (You can't gain or lose life. You can't pay any amount of life except 0.

black.name: Empress
black.text: If an opponent would lose life, you may instead gain that much life.

red.name: Consume
red.text: {1}{R}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

red.name: Berserk
red.text: {R}: Target creature you control gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

red.name: Double Strike
red.text: {3}{R}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

red.name: Enrage
red.text: {2}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

red.name: Storm
red.text: Your spells cost {1} less to cast for each spell played before it this turn.

red.name: Wrath
red.text: If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.

red.name: Rage
red.text: {R}{R}: Deal 1 damage to each player and each creature.

green.name: Sprout
green.text: {1}{G}: Put a 0/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield.

green.name: Convoke
green.text: {T}, tap a creature you control: Add {G} to your mana pool.

green.name: Growth
green.text: {2}{G},{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

green.name: Mulch
green.text: Sacrifice a creature: You gain 2 life.

green.name: Awaken
green.text: All lands are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

green.name: Formation
green.text: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

green.name: Fight
green.text: {3}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

green.name: Locus
green.text: Mana doesn't empty from mana pools as steps and phases end.

green.name: Purist
green.text: Spells that cost generic mana to cast cost {1} more to cast.

gold.name: Domain
gold.text: {2}, {T}: Gain X life, where X is the number of basic land type among lands you control.

gold.name: Filter
gold.text: {2}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

gold.name: Spectrum
gold.text: Creatures with two or more colors get +1/+1 for each of their colors after the first.

gold.name: Tribal
gold.text: As the game begins, choose a creature type. Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

gold.name: Keyword
gold.text: As the game begins, choose first strike, vigilance, lifelink, flying, trample, menace or haste. {3},{T}: Target creature you control gains that ability until end of turn.

gold.name: Tutor
gold.text: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Search your library for a card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

gold.name: Conflux
gold.text: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.

gold.name: Maelstrom
gold.text: Spells you cast with two or more colors cost {1} less to cast.

gold.name: Immortal
gold.text: Nontoken creatures you control with no abilities get +2/+2.

gold.name: Phyrexia
gold.text: All colored mana costs are Phyrexian mana costs.

colorless.name: Salvage
colorless.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add {1} to your mana pool.

colorless.name: Conversion
colorless.text: {4}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

colorless.name: Recycling
colorless.text: {3}, {T}: Put target colorless card from your graveyard on top of your library.

colorless.name: Factory
colorless.text: {2}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token with defender onto the battlefield.

colorless.name: Etched
colorless.text: You may spend colorless mana as though it were mana of any color.

colorless.name: Production
colorless.text: All spells cost {1} less to cast.

colorless.name: Integrity
colorless.text: {4}, {T}: Target artifact gains indestructible until end of turn.

colorless.name: Sunblast
colorless.text: {3}, {T}: Deal X damage to each creature, where X is the number of colors that creature is.

colorless.name: Envy
colorless.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses X life, where X is the number of colors among permanents they control.
